description.en: Short overview of the didactics history and its different methods. History of teaching handicraft skills in Estonia and in rest of the world. Intergenerational learning method. Introduction to the valid state curricula. Possibilities how to teach native crafts in school and outside of it. Impacts of manual activities on human physical, spiritual and social level. Motivation in doing and learning handicraft, learner-focused study. Plan and application of teaching. Visit and analyse of lesson.
description.et: Lühiülevaade didaktika ajaloost ja õpikäsitustest. Käsitööoskuste õpetamise ajaloost Eestis ja mujal maailmas. Pärandtehnoloogiline õppimisviis. Tutvumine kehtivate riiklike õppekavadega. Rahvusliku käsitöö kui pärandkultuuri osa õpetamise võimalused koolis ja väljaspool kooli. Käelise tegevuse mõju inimesele füüsilisel, vaimsel ja sotsiaalsel tasandil. Motivatsioon käsitöö tegemisel ja õppimisel, tööprotsessi väärtustav õppijakeskne käsitööõpe. Õpetuse planeerimine ja läbiviimine. Õppetunni külastus ja analüüs.

objectives.en: To aqcuire knowledge on didactics and realise craft education as a multidisciplinary field.
objectives.et: Didaktika alaste teadmiste omandamine ja käsitööõppe kui multidistsiplinaarse valdkonna tajumine.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon successful completion of the course student:
- has an overview of teaching theories and the history of teaching handicraft;
learning_outcomes.et: -	Omab ülevaadet õpetamisteooriatest ja käsitöö õpetamise ajaloost;

learning_outcomes.en: - sees the regularities of the development of the handicraft skills, and is able to consider these during the planning process of the studies;
learning_outcomes.et: -	Näeb seaduspärasusi käsitööoskuste arendamisel ja oskab nendega arvestada õppetöö planeerimisel;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the aims and content of the skill subjects in state educational curricula;
learning_outcomes.et: -	Tunneb oskusainete üldeesmärke ja õppesisu üldhariduskoolide  riiklikes õppekavades;

learning_outcomes.en: - analyses the motives of acquireing handicraft skills and their dynamics in different age groups and learning situations;
learning_outcomes.et: -	Analüüsib käsitööoskuste õppimise motiive ja nende muutumist erinevates vanuserühmades ja õpisituatsioonides;

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to see and analyse learning environment and process.
learning_outcomes.et: -	Oskab vaadelda ja analüüsida õppekeskkonda ja õppeprotsessi.

independent_work.et:
1.Find one text that is somehow meaningful to you. Please use this text as a starting point for a short essay that opens you as teacher. Choose freely the form of your work - it may be written in the style that suits you, you may use visual storytelling etc. The length of the work should be no longer than 2 A4 pages.
2. Search for different methods that are used in teaching and learning processes in the subject that you are researching or plan to concentrate during your studies.
Find as many different types of examples as possible.
Your task is to give in seminar 15 to 20 min overview of your findings. Compose PowerPoint or Prezi presentation of good, clear and easy to understand materials. Show also not so effective ways of teaching your subject in crafts.
Search for books, videos, worksheets, text describing processes, apps, drawings, photos, diagrams, recorded audio instructions etc. Bring out the best and the worst in materials that you find. Show as many different types of materials as you can find. The use of digital materials available online is welcome.
Bring the presentation with you on memory stick or make it available for yourself online so you can download it to the classroom computer during our meeting.
3. 20 best tips for myself - write your own short "handbook" for future learning situations that supports you as teacher. The form of your "handbook" is free, you may include drawings, videos etc. but it can also be written as essay or just list of 20 tips.
